# action

**Instance Property**

The action sent to the first responder when the user selects a new font from the Font panel or chooses a command from the Font menu.

## Declaration

```swift
var action: Selector { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default action is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/changeFont:]. You should rarely need to change this setting.

## Accessing the Action Property

- **target**: The object that receives action messages related to the font manager.
